vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.14.3;
son of: Ahitub (H0285);
father of: Abiathar (H0054); also called Ahijah (KJV: Ahiah) at 1Sa.14.3,18;
Also named: a.chiy.yah (אֲחִיָּ֫הוּ "Ahijah" H0281O)
§ Ahimelech = "my brother is king" or "brother of Melek"
1) a priest murdered by Doeg at Saul's command, for supposedly assisting David
2) a Hittite warrior under David
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Ahitub; padre de Abiatar; sacerdote; en tiempos del rey David; (b)   hitita; guerrero; en tiempos del rey David; (c)   hijo de Abiatar; sacerdote; en tiempos del rey David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞希米勒 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我兄弟是王" 或 "王的兄弟"
1) 一位祭司, 他因為被懷疑幫助大衛, 而被多益 (依著掃羅王下的命令) 所殺
2) 大衛王手下的一位赫族人勇士 (撒上 26:6)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚希米勒 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我兄弟是王" 或 "王的兄弟"
1) 一位祭司, 他因为被怀疑帮助大卫, 而被多益 (依着扫罗王下的命令) 所杀
2) 大卫王手下的一位赫族人勇士 (撒上 26:6)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.26.6
§ Ahimelech = "my brother is king" or "brother of Melek"
1) a priest murdered by Doeg at Saul's command, for supposedly assisting David
2) a Hittite warrior under David

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.8.17;
son of: Abiathar (H0054);
brother of: Jonathan (H3083I)
Also named: a.vi.me.lekh (אֲבִימֶ֫לֶךְ "Ahimelech" H0040J)
§ Ahimelech = "my brother is king" or "brother of Melek"
1) a priest murdered by Doeg at Saul's command, for supposedly assisting David
2) a Hittite warrior under David
